div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1619 Tripolis, Phoenicia, 1884-1885 (1130) Burial: c. 100-50 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 520 AR Demetrius II: 5 tetradr. Alexander II: 36 tetradr. Antiochus VIII: 20 tetradr. Antiochus VIII and Cleopatra: 1 tetradr. Antiochus IX: 1 tetradr. Aradus: 27 tetradr. Tripolis: 20 tetradr. Disposition: New York some from Rouvier Coll. but Newell's tickets do not in- dicate which pieces are from the hd. Rouvier, Jour. Asiatique 1898, p. 13 Six, AN 1886, p. 231, note 1
